source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Woodworking: Table Saw Essentials

visible_instructors.job_title: Managing Editor & Instructor of Woodworkers Guild of America
visible_instructors.name: George
visible_instructors.title: George Vondriska

items.headline: This extensive woodworking course will help you safely and effectively use your Table Saw
objectives_summary: This instructional course provides you with must-have information for setting up and safely using your table saw.
How to rip and crosscut, set up a stackable dado head, cut rabbets and more.
What differentiates one blade from another and when they should be used.

items.title: URBAN sketchers, BASIC, EASY put people in scenes. PART 2

visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur
visible_instructors.name: Nicola A
visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore

items.headline: Learn a simple formula for putting people in your pictures AND gain more confidence for sketching in public
objectives_summary: Discover an easier way to sketch people.
Learn the basic to draw different postures for variety.
Get to grips with the measurements of the human body.

items.title: Master Interlocking Shapes: Paint Your Own Stunning Art

visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor
visible_instructors.name: Robert
visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner

items.headline: Smart Design Concepts For Fine Artists
objectives_summary: When you are finished with this class you will have a deep understanding of how to begin a painting using interlocking shapes. This design technique will help make your compositions and shapes more cohesive. And as the saying goes a well designed painting is half way done.

items.title: Art School for Kids

visible_instructors.job_title: Professional musician, artist, writer, and teacher
visible_instructors.name: Roberta
visible_instructors.title: Roberta Hayes

items.headline: All ages between 10 and 90 are welcome!  Learn basic principals of art, with projects ranging from drawing to painting!
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will be able to draw and paint some really cool pictures!
In this course, you will learn basic art terminology, basic drawing and painting techniques.

items.title: Impressionism - Paint a Venice Night scene in oil or acrylic
items.headline: Learn Impressionism techniques by creating this Venice Nights painting. For total beginner through advanced painters.
objectives_summary: Create an entire painting in one sitting
Understand Impressionism and why it is so powerful
Understand how light works to make things look the way they do, and how to translate that into your paintings

items.title: Watercolor Painting - Understanding Tone

visible_instructors.job_title: I am a Watercolorist and Art Instructor.
visible_instructors.name: Arie
visible_instructors.title: Arie Swanepoel

items.headline: I believe this course will assist you in judging tone and improve your painting skills.
objectives_summary: What tone is.
How to judge tone to improve your own painting skill.
How light and shadows effect tone.

items.title: Watercolor painting: Realistic Dog portrait, step by step
items.headline: Follow me painting step by step and create this awesome watercolor dog with me without any effort
objectives_summary: capture the personality of the dog you're painting in watercolor
learn how to paint true to life: realistic eyes, nose, tongue, fur, emotions and expression
mix paints and create color balance. You will learn how to do layering and build up the color

items.title: The Complete Guide to Flower Box Arrangement
items.headline: A step-by-step guide for beginner and intermediate florists to learn how to arrange flowers in a box
objectives_summary: Master flower arrangement basic principles
Develop your arrangement style and be confident to create new designs
Hone your skills by practicing with step-by-step guided projects

items.title: Drawing Nature - Quick Sketch Flower Edition
items.headline: Discover how to quickly draw and illustrate flowers with pencil and pen & ink
objectives_summary: Drawing flowers in a quick, yet convincing way with pencil and pen
Sketch with a pen
Start with learning to draw a simple flower and eventually move on to complete scenes

items.title: The Ultimate Drawing Course for beginners - With Certificate
items.headline: Your way to becoming a professional artist - From 0 to 10
objectives_summary: You will learn drawing professionally
Find your drawing style in just one hour
shapes Configuration from basic lines

items.title: Drawing & Painting Cute Cartoon Animals for Beginners
items.headline: Beginners Will Learn How to Draw, Watercolor Paint, & Color Cute Cartoon Animals. Step-By-Step Art Projects for All Ages
objectives_summary: Create 12 fabulous works of art inspired by Cute Cartoon Animals!
Participate in an activity that cultivates critical thinking skills, develops hand-eye coordination, and encourages self-expression.
Apply the knowledge gained in this course to create unique masterpieces.

items.title: Intuitive Painting with Mandalas
items.headline: Painting mandalas metaphorically increases creativity, changes the way you paint and pleasures the mind.
objectives_summary: Identify what your life purpose is through the work with the meditations and the painting
Apply and practice new techniques of painting, such as paint throwing, drybrushing, layering and detailed brushstrokes which will enhance every piece of art you create from here on in
Concentrate to a degree never before thought possible, through the development of the mind, so that more focus and courage happen while in process of making a painting

items.title: Acrylic Abstract Painting - Little Treasures
items.headline: with Andy Morris
objectives_summary: Ability to create your own acrylic abstracts on little 6x6 Panels, as well as learn how to build these little panels

items.title: Paper Quilling Art - Beginner to Advanced
items.headline: Its all about Paper Quilling Art... A step-by-step course to fuel your creative & crafting journey of artistic creations
objectives_summary: Learn to make various Quilling Shapes
Learn Quilling techniques by doing 3 beautiful Quilling projects
Learn to make different designs and techniques to make a Quilling Portrait

items.title: Learn Festival Drawing: Step by Step, for Kids & Beginners
items.headline: Easy and Interesting Art! No Drawing Experience Necessary. Follow the Steps to Create useful Drawings. For ages 8+
objectives_summary: Create 20+ awesome cartoon drawings and art letters.
Create 8 lovely drawing for festivals.
Develops hand-eye coordination.

items.title: Learn to PLAN & PAINT a watercolor landscape in 9 easy steps

visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur
visible_instructors.name: Nicola A
visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore

items.headline: Learn to paint any subject by painting this watercolor landscape, and see how easy it is to plan, design then paint.
objectives_summary: You will learn how to plan an order of work for a watercolour painting
You will become proficient in choosing and mixing greens in watercolours
You will be confident when laying a watercolour wash over a large area
